html:
We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

Need something to look forward to tomorrow? How does a release of Android 16 Beta 3 sound?

The official Android developers account on Twitter said today that they are “dropping Android 16 Beta 3 tomorrow!” That would mean a release on March 13. They didn’t give us a specific time for release, but you can probably guess based on previous releases.
